Sample Audit or Inspection Checklist, Form QAS-2¶

Note

Auditors or Inspectors are to complete the checklist and submit the checklists to Head od Qulaity for approval before conduting the audits ro inspections.

Sample Audit or Inspection Form, QAS-3¶

Note

Use a separate sheet of paper to expand on discrepancies.

Important

Keep all Checklists, Audit or Inspection forms together and return them to the Head of Quality.
